Package de.chojo.sadu.queries.converter

Class StandardValueConverter

java.lang.Object
de.chojo.sadu.queries.converter.StandardValueConverter
public final class StandardValueConverter extends Object
The StandardValueConverter class provides a set of predefined ValueConverters for various types. Each ValueConverter maps between a Java type and an intermediate SQL type.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ValueConverter<Instant,Long>
    INSTANT_MILLIS
    Writes and reads Instant as unix epoch in milliseconds
    static final ValueConverter<Instant,Long>
    INSTANT_SECONDS
    Writes and reads Instant as unix epoch in seconds
    static final ValueConverter<Instant,Timestamp>
    INSTANT_TIMESTAMP
    Writes and reads Instant as Timestamp
    static final ValueConverter<LocalDate,Date>
    LOCAL_DATE
    Writes and reads LocalDate as Date.
    static final ValueConverter<LocalDateTime,Timestamp>
    LOCAL_DATE_TIME
    Writes and reads LocalDateTime as Timestamp
    static final ValueConverter<LocalTime,Time>
    LOCAL_TIME
    Writes and reads LocalTime as Time.

    OFFSET_DATE_TIME
    Writes and reads OffsetDateTime as Timestamp.

    OFFSET_TIME
    Writes and reads OffsetTime as Time.
    static final ValueConverter<UUID,byte[]>
    UUID_BYTES
    Writes and reads UUID as Byte[].
    static final ValueConverter<UUID,String>
    UUID_STRING
    Writes and reads UUID as String.
    static final ValueConverter<ZonedDateTime,Timestamp>
    ZONED_DATE_TIME
    Writes and reads ZonedDateTime as Timestamp.

      public static final ValueConverter<Instant,Long> INSTANT_MILLIS
      Writes and reads Instant as unix epoch in milliseconds

    • INSTANT_SECONDS

      public static final ValueConverter<Instant,Long> INSTANT_SECONDS
      Writes and reads Instant as unix epoch in seconds

    • INSTANT_TIMESTAMP

      public static final ValueConverter<Instant,Timestamp> INSTANT_TIMESTAMP
      Writes and reads Instant as Timestamp

    • LOCAL_DATE_TIME

      public static final ValueConverter<LocalDateTime,Timestamp> LOCAL_DATE_TIME
      Writes and reads LocalDateTime as Timestamp

    • OFFSET_DATE_TIME

      public static final ValueConverter<OffsetDateTime,Timestamp> OFFSET_DATE_TIME
      Writes and reads OffsetDateTime as Timestamp. Will be stored in UTC.

    • ZONED_DATE_TIME

      public static final ValueConverter<ZonedDateTime,Timestamp> ZONED_DATE_TIME
      Writes and reads ZonedDateTime as Timestamp. Will be stored in UTC.

    • OFFSET_TIME

      public static final ValueConverter<OffsetTime,Time> OFFSET_TIME
      Writes and reads OffsetTime as Time. Will be stored as LocalTime.

    • LOCAL_DATE

      public static final ValueConverter<LocalDate,Date> LOCAL_DATE
      Writes and reads LocalDate as Date.

    • LOCAL_TIME

      public static final ValueConverter<LocalTime,Time> LOCAL_TIME

      public static final ValueConverter<UUID,byte[]> UUID_BYTES
      Writes and reads UUID as Byte[].

    • forEnum

      @Contract("_ -> new") @NotNull public static <T extends Enum<T>> @NotNull ValueConverter<T,String> forEnum(Class<T> clazz)
      Writes and reads Enum as String.
      Type Parameters:
      T - enum type
      Parameters:
      clazz - enum class
      Returns:
      A new ValueConverter instance for that specific enum type

      @Contract("_ -> new") @NotNull public static @NotNull ValueConverter<LocalDate,Date> localDate(Calendar calendar)
      Writes and reads LocalDate as Date.
      Parameters:
      calendar - The calendar used to construct the date
      Returns:
      A new ValueConverter instance using the Calendar

      A new ValueConverter instance using the Calendar

      @Contract("_ -> new") @NotNull public static @NotNull ValueConverter<OffsetTime,Time> offsetTime(Calendar calendar)
      Writes and reads OffsetTime as Time. Will be stored as LocalTime.

      calendar - The calendar used to construct the time
      Returns:
      A new ValueConverter instance using the Calendar
